title: Cross-repo spawns should commit workspace back to spawning repo
Add reverse lint: show affected skills when CLI commands change
Review and update orch init - creates outdated file structure
description:
orch init creates outdated file structure that no longer matches current patterns.

**Observed:**
- Creates .orch/CLAUDE.md (skeleton with template markers)
- References non-existent 'orch build-orchestrator-context' command
- May have other outdated patterns

**Expected:**
- Review current orch init behavior against actual usage patterns
- Update to match how projects are actually structured now
- Remove references to deprecated commands/patterns

**Triggered by:** Initializing orch-cli itself and noticing the mismatch

title: Add spawn context quality validation - fail fast if context <100 lines
orch wait shows 'Unknown' phase when agent hasn't filled workspace yet
